overview: Two actresses, forced to share a claustrophobic airstream on set, borrow a camera and engage in an increasingly disturbing series of interviews. A 30-minute fever dream shot handheld in an airstream. The claustrophobia and obsession is palpable, as we watch characters, Layla and Devon, completely unravel. ...the deranged step-sister of the Hollywood Cinderella, a biting critique of womanhood in the film industry; a feminist manifesto about losing and regaining control.
title: Victim Number
